name: Intelligence Network
description: Agents assigned on CHOAM Infiltration produce 100% more Solari; Agents assigned on Landsraad Infiltration produce 100% more Influence
perks: Agents assigned on CHOAM Infiltration produce 100% more Solari
Agents assigned on Landsraad Infiltration produce 100% more Influence

childs.name: Diplomatic Maneuvers
perks: Unlocks 1 Agent slot in Landsraad Infiltration
Agents assigend on a faction in Truce produce 10 Solari
Unlocks the Political Agreement Treaty

childs.name: Negotiation Tactics
perks: Minor Houses deliver Dump Box near Imperial Base after every Landsraad Council
Agents assigend on Spacing Guild Infiltration proudce 0,1 Guild Favor
10% CHAOM Share dividents per agent assigend to CHOAM Infiltration

childs.name: Emperor Eyes
perks: Fills 3 Counterintelligence slots with unmoveable Emperor Eye Agents
Agents assigned on opposing factions produce +5 Intel

childs.name: Political Stance
perks: 3 Landsraad Guards appear near Imperial Base after every Landsraad Council Each Treaty contracted with another faction grants a production bonus of +10% in ints associated ressource
Unlocks Embassy Building in Imperial Base

childs.name: Spying Logistic
perks: 150% Agent recruitment speed
+15% Intel production
Unlocks the Intelligence Agency Building in Imperial Base

childs.name: Stealth Gear
perks: Reduces the daily chance of Agent capture when assigned on a faction
-15% daily Supply drain in enemy territory
-50%spying mission Solari cost

childs.name: Spying Mastery
perks: +3 Intel production per ally Sietch
+5 max Agents
Allows the training of Assassin

childs.name: Outrageous Wealth
perks: +5% unit Power per faction with less CHOAM Shares
+2 Influence production per faction with less CHOAM Shares
Unlocks the Emperor Monument Building in Imperial Base
